zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[弱势震荡趋势]
zh.content:
当前以太坊(ETH)对美元的价格为2918.29，整体呈现出弱势震荡的趋势。24小时内价格微幅下跌0.75%，表明市场情绪较为谨慎。高点2940.47和低点2917.11的波动范围有限，显示出市场缺乏强烈的方向性突破。

从技术指标来看，MACD显示为负值(-43.95848)，表明短期内卖方力量占优，可能会继续压制价格走势。而SMA(20)在3076.6245附近，形成了一条重要的阻力线，价格若能突破该水平，才可能重新获得上涨动能。RSI数据缺失，需关注未来的超买或超卖信号。

在支撑方面，2917.11是短期关键支撑位，如跌破此位，可能引发进一步回调，目标可看向2850附近。而在阻力方面，2940.47为当前主要阻力位，突破后可望挑战2970水平。建议投资者在此区间内谨慎操作，若价格持续维持在2917.11上方，考虑适度买入，反之则可考虑止损。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently trading at $2918.29, reflecting a slight decline of 0.75% over the past 24 hours. The recent high of $2940.47 and low of $2917.11 suggest a narrow trading range, indicating indecision among traders. This price action points to a potential consolidation phase, as the market seems to be searching for a clear direction. A break above the recent high could signal a bullish trend, while a drop below the low may prompt further selling pressure.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of the RSI(14) reading limits our ability to assess momentum accurately. However, the MACD at -43.95848 indicates bearish momentum, suggesting that sellers are currently in control. Monitoring the MACD's movement in relation to its signal line will be crucial for identifying potential reversals. Meanwhile, the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $3076.6245 suggests that Ethereum is trading below its recent average, reinforcing the bearish sentiment and highlighting resistance at this level.

Support levels appear to be forming around the recent low of $2917, while the next significant support may be found near $2800, a psychological level that could attract buyers if tested. Conversely, resistance can be identified near the $2940 area, with the SMA acting as a key barrier. A decisive move above $2940 could open the door for a rally toward the $3000 mark, while failure to hold above support may lead to a retest of lower levels.

For traders, maintaining a cautious stance is advisable in the current market environment. Those looking to enter long positions should consider waiting for confirmation of a breakout above $2940, accompanied by a bullish MACD crossover. Short positions may be warranted if the price closes below $2917, potentially targeting the next support level at $2800. Prioritizing risk management and setting stop-loss orders will be essential in navigating this volatile market.
